 // Script include to check the Verification of Student ID and submitted Estimated Expense Values

 vaSystem.sendBatchedMessages(); // send any batched messages
 vaVars.ReviewNeeded = false; // set review needed to false
 var grExp = new GlideRecord('x_snc_sfin_aid_estimated_expenses') // expense Table
 grExp.addEncodedQuery('financial_aid='+ vaInputs.financial_aid_record_creation);
 grExp.query();

 while(grExp.next()){

 var VerifyReg = new FinRegexVerification();
 var fieldMessage='';

 fieldMessage = VerifyReg.ExpenseVerify( grExp.expense_type,grExp.dollar_value); 
 // call expenseverify script method
 if(fieldMessage != 'Pass'){
 // if it did not pass set the expense record to ReviewNeeded = true
 vaVars.ReviewNeeded = true;
 grExp.setValue('review_needed',true);
 grExp.update();
 break;
 }
 }
 })()","id":"57fae8e013ee4cf68cd13cbfe087db3f","name":"Expense Script Validation","goal_id":"primary","applicability":{"type":"Applicability","type":"Applicability","mode":"script","value":"true"}},{"type":"HtmlOutputPrompt","type":"HtmlOutputPrompt","height":0,"width":0,"id":"87e6328ced294f8c9d28e2f3f52f8cac","name":"Download","goal_id":"primary","applicability":{"type":"Applicability","type":"Applicability","mode":"script","value":"true"},"value":{"type":"String","type":"String","mode":"string","value":"<html>

 grExp.update();
 break;
 }
 }

          "script": "(function execute(){\n\n    // The following code uses a default vaSystem method to attach the uploaded attachment to our target record    \n    vaSystem.attachToRecord(vaInputs.upload_file.getValue(),'x_snc_sfin_aid_financial_aid',vaInputs.financial_aid_record_creation);\n\n    })()",

        "ccb8d055c07b4936974077d963c03720": {
          "id": "ccb8d055c07b4936974077d963c03720",
          "name": "Financial Aid Verification",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n    // Script include to check the Verification of Student ID and submitted Estimated Expense Values\n       vaVars.FinVerify = new FinRegexVerification().FinancialAidRegex(vaInputs.financial_aid_record_creation.student,vaInputs.financial_aid_record_creation.student_id);\n    })()",
          "stepType": "ScriptAction",
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        },
        "2a1b8c96f65a41fc82677925f88d267a": {

          "stepType": "CrudAction",
          "name": "Cancel request",
          "template": "u_state=Cancelled",

        "57fae8e013ee4cf68cd13cbfe087db3f": {
          "id": "57fae8e013ee4cf68cd13cbfe087db3f",
          "name": "Expense Script Validation",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n    \n    vaSystem.sendBatchedMessages(); // send any batched messages\n    vaVars.ReviewNeeded = false; // set review needed to false\n    var grExp = new GlideRecord('x_snc_sfin_aid_estimated_expenses') // expense Table\n    grExp.addEncodedQuery('financial_aid='+ vaInputs.financial_aid_record_creation);\n    grExp.query();\n\n      while(grExp.next()){\n\n         var VerifyReg = new FinRegexVerification();\n         var fieldMessage='';\n\n         fieldMessage = VerifyReg.ExpenseVerify( grExp.expense_type,grExp.dollar_value); \n         // call expenseverify script method\n          if(fieldMessage != 'Pass'){\n            // if it did not pass set the expense record to ReviewNeeded = true\n                vaVars.ReviewNeeded = true;\n                grExp.setValue('review_needed',true);\n                grExp.update();\n                 break;\n                }\n      }\n    })()",
          "stepType": "ScriptAction",
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        },

          "value": "<html>\n <body>\n<!-- This creates a link of the attachment from the attachment table-->\n<p>\n<a href='sys_attachment.do?sys_id=769d847e47696910d92d7395d36d4343' rel='nofollow'> Financial Aid Request Form PDF</a>\n</p>\n</body>\n</html>",
          "height": "0",
          "width": "0",
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        },
